sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Link } from 'react-router-dom';
import { Typography, Button, Grid, Paper, Box } from '@mui/material';
import ChatIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Chat';
import EventIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Event';
import FavoriteIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Favorite';

const HomeScreen = () => {
  return (
    <Box sx={{ textAlign: 'center', py: 4 }}>
      <Typography variant="h4" gutterBottom sx={{ mb: 4 }}>
        Welcome to HealthAI Assistant
      </Typography>
      <Grid container spacing={4} justifyContent="center">
        <Grid item xs={12} sm={4}>
          <Paper elevation={3} sx={{ p: 3, height: '100%', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', justifyContent: 'space-between', transition: '0.3s', '&:hover': { transform: 'translateY(-5px)' } }}>
            <ChatIcon sx={{ fontSize: 60, color: 'primary.main', mb: 2 }} />
            <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
              Chat with AI
            </Typography>
            <Typography variant="body2" sx={{ mb: 2 }}>
              Get instant answers to your health questions
            </Typography>
            <Button variant="contained" component={Link} to="/chat" sx={{ mt: 'auto' }}>
              Start Chat
            </Button>
          </Paper>
        </Grid>
        <Grid item xs={12} sm={4}>
          <Paper elevation={3} sx={{ p: 3, height: '100%', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', justifyContent: 'space-between', transition: '0.3s', '&:hover': { transform: 'translateY(-5px)' } }}>
            <EventIcon sx={{ fontSize: 60, color: 'primary.main', mb: 2 }} />
            <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
              Appointments
            </Typography>
            <Typography variant="body2" sx={{ mb: 2 }}>
              Schedule and manage your medical appointments
            </Typography>
            <Button variant="contained" component={Link} to="/appointments" sx={{ mt: 'auto' }}>
              Manage Appointments
            </Button>
          </Paper>
        </Grid>
        <Grid item xs={12} sm={4}>
          <Paper elevation={3} sx={{ p: 3, height: '100%', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', justifyContent: 'space-between', transition: '0.3s', '&:hover': { transform: 'translateY(-5px)' } }}>
            <FavoriteIcon sx={{ fontSize: 60, color: 'primary.main', mb: 2 }} />
            <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
              Vitals Tracking
            </Typography>
            <Typography variant="body2" sx={{ mb: 2 }}>
              Monitor and record your health vitals
            </Typography>
            <Button variant="contained" component={Link} to="/vitals" sx={{ mt: 'auto' }}>
              Track Vitals
            </Button>
          </Paper>
        </Grid>
      </Grid>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default HomeScreen;
